name: Walking Wake
flavorText: This ferocious creature is shrouded in mystery. It's named after an aquatic monster mentioned in an old expedition journal.

previous.name: Miraidon
previous.flavorText: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.

next.name: Iron Leaves
next.flavorText: Many of its physical characteristics match those of a Virizion from the future that was covered in a paranormal magazine.
